NIGHTLIGHT/Termitron/Trinity::

Nightlight didn't say anything else and she sat down near Aerotaur. 
Some ran towards thew room where they were, some one arrived to the 
room "GOOOD NEWWS!!!"said a loud Termitron.

Before Nightlight could said something, Trinity woke up "What's 
happening??"said Trinity who still was sleepy.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>      "I understand the risks, but I must confront him.  It's just 
something I have to do.  But first We have to wait for Termitron to 
find us a new home."  He sighs and leans back against the wall.
